translations: 资助，补助，给……发津贴；（政府）资助，出资支持；向……行贿

sentences.sentence: We also don't want to subsidize the indolence of people who are too lazy to work.
sentences.translation: 我们也不想补贴那些懒得工作的人。

sentences.sentence: She's not prepared to subsidize his gambling any longer.
sentences.translation: 她再不愿意拿钱供他去赌博了。
鼓励和资助在家里煮饭。
